contextId.occurrenceNote: The word "this" refers to what the writer will say next. For clarity, the clauses may be reversed. Alternate translation: "Because my enemy does not triumph over me, I know that you delight in me" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-events]])
contextId.glQuote: By this I know that you delight in me, for my enemy does not triumph over me
